org.objectstyle.cayenne.map
Class DbAttributePair

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.map.DbAttributePair
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLSerializable
Deprecated. Since 1.1 DbJoin is used.

public class DbAttributePair
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLSerializable

A DbAttributePair represents a join between two database tables. A PK/FK relationship consists of one or more joins. Correspinding Cayenne descriptor object, DbRelationship, contains one or more DbAtributePairs.

Author:
Misha Shengaout, Andrei Adamchik
